mapper.insert: insert into orderdetail(O_DETAILCODE, O_AMOUNT,ORDER_NUM, FOODCODE) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(O_DETAILCODE),0)+1 from orderdetail),#{o_amount},#{order_num},#{foodcode})
insert into orders(order_num, o_address, o_req, o_pay,o_mileage,o_date) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(order_num),0)+1 from orders), #{o_address},#{o_req},#{o_pay},#{o_mileage},sysdate)
mapper.select: select order_num, o_pay, o_req, o_address,r_code from orders where order_num = #{order_num}
